landingPage.serviceText1: உங்களுக்கு பொருத்தமான வரன்களைநீங்களே தேர்ந்து எடுத்து கொள்ளலாம்,தமிழில் முழு வரனின் விபரங்களை அறியலாம்
landingPage.serviceText2: தமிழில் வரன்கள்,புகைப்படம், ஜாதக கட்டத்துடன்வரன்கள், மிக விரைவான சேவை, நம்பகமான ராசியான நிறுவனம்
landingPage.serviceText3: எங்கள் நிறுவனத்தில் அனைத்து இனத்தவருக்கும் பதிவு கட்டணம் இலவசம். வேறு கட்டணம் எதுவும் கிடையாது
landingPage.supportSubheading: Say hello to our New & Improved App!
landingPage.supportP1: We are delighted to announce the launch of our new Mobile Application to give the users a more interactive and superior access to our matchmaking services.
landingPage.supportP2: Hope you like how the app has turned out!
landingPage.supportP3: To get started, please remove the previously installed Tamil Marriages App from your device (s) and install again using the link shared below.
landingPage.fearurePara: They say marriages are made in heaven and to make it a seamless process, we at Tamil Marriages.com strive to mix the right-minded people together.We welcome you all to meet the innumerable married couples who have found their dream partner through us and have shared their success stories!We wish them all the very best for a happy and successful married life.
landingPage.personSlider1para: This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.
landingPage.personSlider2para: This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.
landingPage.personSlider3para: This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.
